entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
